sentences.en: "This is not good," he said with great seriousness.
sentences.cn: 他特别严肃地说：“这可不好。”

sentences.en: Don't overestimate seriousness of the problem.
Everybody recognized the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 谁都看出了局势的严重性.

sentences.en: He maintained an attitude of high seriousness.
sentences.cn: 他保持了极为认真的态度.

sentences.en: He spoke with a seriousness that was unusual in him.
sentences.cn: 他说话时神情少有地认真。

sentences.en: He was beginning to understand the seriousness of life.
sentences.cn: 他渐渐地懂得了生活的严肃性.

sentences.en: Her voice was imbued with an unusual seriousness.
sentences.cn: 她的声音里充满着一种不寻常的严肃语气。

sentences.en: It would be a mistake to understate the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.cn: 对该问题的严重性轻描淡写是错误的。

sentences.en: Lillith's formality and seriousness amused him.
sentences.cn: 利莉思的拘礼和严肃让他觉得好笑。

sentences.en: Only later did he realize the full seriousness of his offence.
sentences.cn: 他后来才意识到他的罪行有多严重.

sentences.en: Only the chairman's strong control was able to impart some sense of seriousness to the meeting.
sentences.cn: 只有主席强有力的掌握会场的能力才能使会议具有某种严肃感。

sentences.en: She spoke with great seriousness of the hardships she had endured.
sentences.cn: 她非常严肃地讲述了自己经历的苦难.

sentences.en: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality .
sentences.cn: 很难从全局上理解局势的严重性。

sentences.en: The sudden summoning of the Cabinet underlines the seriousness of the situation.
sentences.cn: 内阁会议的突然召开,突出了局势的严重性.

sentences.en: They had shown a commitment and seriousness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 他们已经立下承诺，并表达了想要实现目标的诚意。

sentences.en: When he summed up, the judge reminded the jury of the seriousness of the case.
sentences.cn: 法官在概述证据时提醒陪审团注意案件的严重性.

sentences.en: With great seriousness he pondered upon the problem.
sentences.cn: 他极其严肃地仔细考虑问题。

words.tran_cn: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
